course_details: Introduction to C Programming is a foundational course with a credit time of 4 units. It covers the basics of the C programming language, teaching students the essential concepts and syntax.
Web Development Fundamentals is a comprehensive course with a credit time of 5 units. It covers the essential building blocks of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. .

Data Science Fundamentals is an in-depth course spanning 6 credit units, providing a comprehensive introduction to the field of data science. Students will learn data analysis, gaining vital skills for working with data.

Graphic Design Mastery is an advanced course focusing on the art and techniques of graphic design. Participants will develop expertise in creating visually stunning graphics and creative professionals.

Advanced Machine Learning is an advanced-level course that delves deep into machine learning algorithms and advanced AI concepts. This course is designed for individuals seeking a comprehensive understanding of cutting-edge.

Digital Marketing Essentials is a fundamental course covering the core principles of digital marketing and online advertising strategies. This course equips participants with essential skills to navigate the digital landscape.

Mobile App Development is a comprehensive course designed to teach participants how to create mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms. Students will learn and gain hands-on experience in building mobile apps.

Business Finance and Strategy is a strategic course that provides insights into financial management and long-term planning for businesses. Participants will learn essential skills and strategies sustainable growth.

The Creative Writing Workshop is a dynamic course tailored to enhance participants' creative writing skills. This workshop fosters storytelling abilities and empowers students to craft compelling narratives and essays.
